titleStmt.title: Obedient patience in general, and in XX particular cases with helps to obtain and use it, and impatience repressed : cross-bearers less to be pityed that cross-makers / written for his own use under the cross, imposed by God and man, and published as now seasonable ... by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Congregational Library (London, England).
